attributes.action: Form and Establish an Internet Crime Centre
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Petition the Government to set up an Internet Crime Complaint Centre, whose sole purpose is to investigate and prosecute those responsible for Internet Crime, for example:

Internet Crimes Against Children, 
Identity Theft and Fraud, 
Credit-Card Schemes, 
Email Scamming and Phishing, 
Investment Schemes Online,  
Auction and Retail Schemes Online,     
Business Opportunity/"Work-at-Home" Schemes Online.  

And provide a site where the public can file an Internet crime complaint
